name: Guilty Summer Kiss 2 - Bloody Secret
description:
School, girls, love in the air, and… a dark bloody mystery?
The Guilty Summer Kiss 2 game can surprise even the most experienced players!

The second part of the dating simulator will please you with unexpected turns of the plot! Kidnapped girls, a secret laboratory, a seductive headmistress who tries to prevent you from revealing the mystery... And that is not all!

We took into account your wishes and decided to keep all three heroines from the previous part in the new game. Тanabe Rei, Sugawara Arisu and Arai Miko - all of them will play a role in the new story! In addition, you will meet new and no less charming girls.
Guilty Summer Kiss 2 presents:
  • A dating simulator with a detective story and a touch of fiction;
  • Riddles and clues, false and true scenarios of what happened, sudden discoveries and amazing adventures;
  • Beautiful heroines with different personalities and habits.

The most popular girl in the school, her sweet but insecure sister, their beautiful and cunning mother and ... a picture of your murdered friend..? How are they related? Is the poor girl really dead, or maybe someone wants to benefit from it? Who knows, maybe she's still alive and you can save her.

Talk to all the heroines, unravel a tangle of riddles together and have fun with the game Guilty Summer Kiss 2!
